timeline.message:
Temporary disable ITs to speed up client developing (#7997)

* Temporary disable ITs to speed up client developing

* Disable also server tests

Increase snapshot version to 3.2-SNAPSHOT (#8026)

* Increase snapshot version to 3.2-SNAPSHOT
Merge branch 'master' into feature/forms

Merge pull request #8066 from vaadin/merge-master

Merge master
add binder and data models
chore: fix lint erros

Remove Constraint in favor of Validator (#8124)

* Remove Constraint in favor of Validator

* Do not export symbols

Adding FormValidator library for client forms (#8008)

* Adding FormValidator library for client forms

* validators are classes implementing Validator

* Implement the rest of validators

* fix lint errors in ts

* Use Validator from Binder library

generate form models (#8137)

* Add java field annotations to the open-api output.

* Generate form models for entities

* model generation for list of entities

* apply review suggestions

* Use constant, and fix sonar warning
Export Required as class instead of a constant to align with other validators (#8152)
AnyModel does not exist, use ObjectModel instead (#8154)

Generate Validations for Models (#8159)

* Generate validators in TS

* re-factor validators to pass an option object in constructor

* Add fromString to the ObjectModel

* align DecimalMin/DecimalMax implementation with java
Add createEmptyValue to Models to simplify Binder instantiation (#8181)
fix ts compilation because of unused imports (#8211)
Merge branch 'master' into merge-master

Merge pull request #8212 from vaadin/merge-master

Merge master
fix ts error when there is nothing used in an import (#8216)

Fix required constrain and return the saved item (#8229)

* Fix required constrain and return the saved item

* Make item optional in append and prependItem

* Do not force save endpoint return type
test: add tests for validator api (#8232)
run webpack in watch mode and in background when debugging intern tests (#8250)

Do not add extra curly brackets when there is a unique argument in ge… (#8243)

* Do not add extra curly brackets when there is a unique argument in generators

run field validation on blur (#8239)

* run field validation on blur

run validators on submit (#8277)

* Validate fields on submit, and prevent it on invalid

* Fix appending to error array

* fix linter errors, isVaadin, and Required

* Fix toString not working with numbers

* Update model.keySymbol when modifying arrays

run validations in parallel, return error objects (#8288)

* Throw when validate fails, run validations in parallel.

* return error objects on validation instead of strings

* display only one error message in field but return all

* add value and validator instance to the error object

fix required in generator, and skip validations if not required (#8317)

* Fix generator always generating the Required validator

* Do not run validators if not required

translate server validation errors to client validation form errors (#8326)

* translate server validation errors to form ones
adding more tests for adding validators to models
validationErrorData is an array of errors
feat: create @vaadin/form package for client-side form (#8347)

Add tests for client-side forms field directive (#8300)

* Add tests for client-side forms field directive

Fixes #7928

Co-authored-by: haijian <haijian@vaadin.com>

fix forms package import in generated models  (#8362)

* Fix client forms imports

- add @vaadin/form to the main package.json
- update model template in the generator to use @vaadin/form
- make tests to verify that @vaadin/form is in package.json
- rename Form.ts to index.ts, and simplify it
fix boolean types in model generator, and fix broken test (#8363)
feat: add binder.clear() method (#8360)

Fix primitive model names (string|number|boolean) for arrays (#8372)

* Fix arrays for primitive models

- fix model names for primitive types in arrays
- add validators also for array properties
- do not consider models for array validations when primitives
add default onchange listener & BinderConfig (#8367)
Merge branch 'master' into merge-master

Merge pull request #8381 from vaadin/merge-master

merge master to feature/forms

vaadin elements strategies  (#8378)

* fixes for the vaadin elements set

- Do not use field-conversor in object models (fix check-group value arrays)
- Do not generate empty objects but null on createEmpty (fix clear time-picker)
- Adding strategies for checked and selected components
- Better stragegy selector for elements (checkbox, radio, listbox, rich-editor)
- fix NotEmpty validator so as it can check arrays (fix check-group arrays)

added strategy tests (#8398)

* re-factor tests to align with forms file structure

* fix element name for checkboxes

* rename file with test models

* adding tests for field strategies
update validator api to allow cross field validations (#8436)
Make validators that imply required indicator extend from Required validator (#8421)

Allow that user can override strategies in binder (#8459)

* Allow that user can override strategies in binder
Merge branch 'feature/forms' into haijian/merge-form-feature-branch
